timeline.bodyText: This section feels a bit confusing the way its constructed. The focus is on the single datapoint assignment that we have to update to reflect that its list of datapointIds has changed.  I dont think its necessary to go filtering through all the other datapoint assignments since all we do is just return as long as they dont match the one we want.
